messages.subject: Re: Thank You
messages.msgSnippet: the rest of you who responded to her, you helped me , too. It sounds really sappy as I re-read it, but, its what I m feeling and I m posting it.........
messages.messageBody:
the rest of you who responded to her, you helped me , too. It sounds
really sappy as I re-read it, but, its what I'm feeling and I'm posting
it.........
**************
Lisa,
No, it doesn't sound sappy, at all :-) I often find when I follow a
thread that it applies to me (in some aspect), as well as the original
poster. It makes me think, ponder, and grow.

Glad to have you here. Happy that you were heartened by the
conversation.

Sharon

messages.subject: Thank You
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings All, I just read all the posts and responses about the mom (forgive me, please, I think it was Gayle?)who was feeling alone, and controlling with the
messages.messageBody:
Greetings All,

I just read all the posts and responses about the mom (forgive me, please, I think it was Gayle?)who was feeling alone, and controlling with the stamp kit post....and IT WAS WONDERFUL!!! Thats me! Thats Me! I feel that way, she spoke for me, I'm new and you answered her BUT you answered me too and I'm so grateful and thankful and glad to be here!!
I posted at AlwaysLearning (i think) and it was aboput principles vs rules and how I needed more guidance and my "delicate sanity" but I think the "control issue" part of these posts was really the meat of what was going on with me and (fate/something/?/i need a better word) intervened and I'm just relieved. So,gayle, by posting and really giving where you were , you gave me the words to where I was, and all the rest of you who responded to her, you helped me , too. It sounds really sappy as I re-read it, but, its what I'm feeling and I'm posting it.........

Lisa, mom to two sons aged 6 and 8 years.

_____________________________________________________________
Netscape. Just the Net You Need.

messages.subject: Thank You
messages.msgSnippet: I would just like to thank everyone for responding.  I really appreciate the great ideas. I am going to take a few days and explore some of the options. Thank
messages.messageBody:
I would just like to thank everyone for responding. I really
appreciate the great ideas. I am going to take a few days and
explore some of the options.

Thank you again,
Lorinda
